line_1: In one dull round of sleeping, eating, drinking,
line_2: A foe to care, but more a foe to thinking.

line_1: Will egg on the fighting and drinking
line_2: And Hugh the town-writer, I'm thinking,

line_1: He told me his Dreams, talk'd of Eating and Drinking;
line_2: But he scarce reads his Bible, and never loves Thinking.

line_1: If thou hast Care too of our Drinking,
line_2: Who of our Victuals thus art Thinking,

line_1: Such emphasis of oaths, and claret drinking!
line_2: Such noise and nonsense, betting, damning, sinking,
But stroll'd to shun the toil of thinking;

line_1: And then — a special friend to drinking! "
line_2: Or just to keep our meat from stinking —

line_1: At Tunbridge let us still be Drinking,
